title: Can You Stiff Your Divorce Lawyer? Tales of How Cunning Clients Can Get Free Legal Work, as Told by an Experienced Divorce Attorney
description:
Not Your Grandpa's Law Practice Management Guide
This hilariously no-nonsense legal practice management guide addresses the single most important—and the single most overlooked—part of lawyer's practice: getting paid for the work.Laugh at Portia's misadventures and learn how to: Get paid for your work  Prevent grievances  Avoid malpractice suits  Weed out bad apple clients Too many law practice management books sell young lawyers on the unicorn dream of living balanced lives while doing good. Not this book. This book gives lawyers tools for keeping the doors open and a shot at paying off those pesky student loans. No, there is no silver bullet. Yes, it is the sort of thing one learns by experience. Unless one can learn from somebody else's mistakes. Which you can, with this guide. Good luck.
author: Portia Porter
